title: Double chocolate and nut muffins
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '50g cocoa powder', '300g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '300ml milk', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '175g chocolate buttons or chocolate chips', '75g chopped walnuts', '50g whole almonds', '4 tablespoons demerara sugar']
